page.title: 08Information Systems
page.content: There is a mobile library which visits the area every Thursday. It offers a comprehensive choice of books and pictures , and selected books are supplied if requested. This service is a boon to the elderly and to housewives , who have no transport to the nearest library. Notices for meetings or events are displayed in the local Post Office and shop. Information on deaths, marriages and births is largely conveyed by word of mouth, as is gossip. No newspapers are available in the morning, but local papers are delivered each afternoon by local children.
